title: [bukkit]掉落物
author: huanmeng_cn
txt_content: 各位大佬，我想请问一下BlockBreakEvent怎么设置掉落物，我是CatServer1122,之前用ItemSpawnEvent破坏是可以修改，但是扔的掉落物也给改了，xd

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
https://hub.spigotmc.org/javadoc ... lockBreakEvent.html

Note: Plugins wanting to simulate a traditional block drop should set the block to air and utilize their own methods for determining what the default drop for the block being broken is and what to do about it, if anything.
